content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate. After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Describe a strategy that this interest group can use to address the issue in the scenario. In the context of the scenario, explain how the resources available to the NEA could impact the effectiveness of the strategy in part A. Explain how a block grant for education could affect the issue in the scenario in some states but not in others.
